title: Pentagon Probes Lawmakers Over Video Urging Troops to Refuse Unlawful Orders
snippets: The Pentagon says it's opening an investigation into Arizona Sen. Mark Kelly in the wake of a video of Democratic lawmakers urging servicemembers not to comply with "illegal orders."

Investigation of Mark Kelly comes after Trump accused the Democrats in the video of ‘seditious behavior, punishable by death’ The Pentagon says it is investigating Arizona senator Mark Kelly for possible breaches of military law after the federal lawmaker joined a handful of other Democrats in a vid

The Pentagon says that it is investigating Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly of Arizona for possible breaches of military law after Kelly joined a handful of other lawmakers in a video that called for U.S. troops to refuse unlawful orders.
Pentagon Probes Democratic Senator After Video to Troops Bloomberg.com
Kelly was one of six lawmakers who appeared in a video urging military members to refuse illegal orders, accusing Trump of pitting the military against American citizens.

The inquiry follows criticism from former President Trump, who accused the lawmakers of seditious behavior. The investigation is ongoing, and no charges have been filed.
constructiveness_reason: This story informs readers about a significant ongoing investigation involving lawmakers and the military. It provides useful context about the situation and the potential implications. However, it does not highlight any progress, solutions, or empowering knowledge.

title: US and Ukraine Unveil Revised Peace Framework Amid Ongoing War Talks
snippets: After talks in Geneva, US and Ukrainian officials agreed any deal should “fully uphold” Ukraine’s sovereignty.

Buccaneers QB Baker Mayfield suffers sprained left shoulder in loss to Rams
summary: Tampa Bay Buccaneers quarterback Baker Mayfield sprained his non-throwing (left) shoulder during a 34-7 loss to the Los Angeles Rams and did not play in the second half. He will undergo an MRI on Monday to assess the injury. Backup quarterback Teddy Bridgewater replaced Mayfield in the third quarter. The Buccaneers' current status regarding Mayfield’s availability will depend on MRI results.
